title: CHANGELOG
description: Here you can see the list of most important updates & changes that has been added to Chrono along the history.
03-aug-2022-descriptionValue: Feat: Not Logged In Home Page.
06-aug-2022-descriptionValue: Feat: Authentication and Logged In Home Page.
07-aug-2022-descriptionValue: Feat: Users are able to create new tasks.
10-aug-2022-descriptionValue: Feat: Users are able to edit and delete their tasks.
14-aug-2022-descriptionValue: Fix: Hours are correctly configured based on timezone.
22-aug-2022-descriptionValue: Feat: Users can add background and thumbnail url images to their profile.
